# How To Contribute

## Installation

* `git clone <repository-url>`
* `cd my-addon`
* `npm install`

## Linting

* `yarn run lint:js`
* `yarn run lint:js -- --fix`

## Running tests

* `yarn run test` â€“ Runs the test suite using mocha

For more information on using ember-cli, visit [https://ember-cli.com/](https://ember-cli.com/).
